rules_text:
When Shattered Sword Cleaver enters, create a 1/1 blue and black Human Warlock creature token with “When this creature dies, surveil 1.” [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Blight {5}{W} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {5}{W}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever a creature you control dies, target opponent creates a 1/1 blue and black Human Warlock creature token with “When this creature dies, surveil 1.” [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
